name: Very Emergency!
description:
Give 'em a taste of their own medicine!

Doctor, you've been miniaturized and safely transported into the belly of your patient. Use your range of weapons to wipe out any icky green germs that cross your path with 5 powerful weapons! However, you'll need to look out. We want to leave the red blood cells alone so they can continue their job pumping through the body.

Make your way through you're patient's body, finding the key to break up the patient's 2 major embolisms. When the patient is looking healthy again, be sure to find a way out for yourself!

Controls

Move - WASD keys

Fire - Left Mouse Button

Reload - R key

Scroll Weapons - Numbers 1-5 or Middle Mouse Wheel

Jump - Spacebar

Map - Tab

Run - Shift

Built using Unity's Creator Kit: FPS. You can download and make your own version of this game for free! It's a great way to learn about game/level design. Check it out today!
